event.text: I think I found a bunch of berries on a bush.
From up close they don't seem so tasty as they used to. I'd better leave them.
They are sour and I don't feel so good. This was a mistake.
Eating them was a mistake. I think I gonna throw up.
He... Hello?... I can't hear... you...
OK, everything's fine. I've fixed it and managed to save some energy.
Nevermind. Signal fixed.
The sig... getting worse and... worse...
I think I saw something in the sky.
Oh shit, it's huge! I gotta hide somewhere. Thankfuly that flyig lizard flew away.
Fuck! That lizard saw me! Run for your life!
Did it lose track of me? Seems like so. Better stay under this rock for a moment.
I can't outrun this fricking lizard. Guess I'll have to try to do it the hard way.
Finally end of this shit. You're dead, lizard! At least you look like eatable.
This lizard harmed me alot and just flew away! What a disgrace! I hope I will not bleed out. I lost some resources.
That wasn't a good idea. That bastard has bitten me painfully. At least it's gone now.
I can't outrun this fricking lizard. Guess I'll have to try to do it the hard way.
Finally end of this shit. You're dead, lizard! At least you look like eatable.
This lizard harmed me alot and just flew away! What a disgrace! I hope I will not bleed out. I lost some resources.
That wasn't a good idea. That bastard has bitten me painfully. At least it's gone now.
I can't outrun this fricking lizard. Guess I'll have to try to do it the hard way.
Finally end of this shit. You're dead, lizard! At least you look like eatable.
This lizard harmed me alot and just flew away! What a disgrace! I hope I will not bleed out. I lost some resources.
That wasn't a good idea. That bastard has bitten me painfully. At least it's gone now.

event.Text: Huh? There's small rock of Aetherite. Nice!

I'm pretty sure that I saw a plant similar to that one here in many databases. The one I saw had healing properties so I guess this will have them too. Despite of harsh taste, I feel fresh energy filling my body and hunger seems to have gone right away.
BlueherbLichen
I see a really odd plant. It has unregular shape and unhealthy colour. I'd better leave it undisturbed.

Oh, there's nice cavern over here. I bet there is something down there.
Light Source
With a light source it will be a lot safer.
Oh yeah! Guess it's a lucky day for me! Someone lost backpack in this cavern but it's mine now!
You... You won't believe it. It is a cave full of Aetherite. What a marvelous glimmer! Enough talking. Someone is gonna collect it all.
Oh it's pretty slippy down here. Shit!... Oh... My arm! A sharp stone must had cut it. But what's this? It is a cave full of Aetherite! What a hypnotising sight! Gotta collect as much as I can and leave this cave as soon as possible.
The stone is wet. I hope not to slide from it. Damn!... My arm! It hurts alot but it doesn't seem to be broken. At least I hope so. Oh, there is some Aetherite. Judging by its size, it wasn't worth the risk but at least it's something.
Damn. I wish I had something to light up this cave. I even can't see if there is anything interesting down there. I think it's not worth taking the risk. I hate such situations so much.
We won't know if we don't check it. I goes pretty nice... Oh shit!... Damn... I feel like something has broken inside of me... I hope I can crawl out of this damned hole... OK, somehow I managed to get out of there but my backpack is somewhere down in the darkness. I won't even try to bring it back.

event.text: Woah! My sensors are running crazy! What's that? This little rock seems to glow!
I wonder what will happen if I try to pick it. I'll try to touch it slowly... I feel... enlightened. My mind is clear and fresh!
Its glow appears so kind to me. I think it's safe to pick it up. I feel energy pulsing from this rock pumping through my body. I feel fresh and healthy.

Its glow appears so kind to me. I wonder what will happen if I try to pick it up... It's painful. My body feels like burning. I threw that damn rock. Oh... Its glow faded and now it looks just like regular Aetherite. Hope it's safe now.

The glow is so pleasing... I'm pretty sure it will be safe to take a close look of it. Shit! The thing is really hot! My body feels burning inside! I would do anything to end this misery!... The fire is burning out. Strange, my wounds seem to regenerate in unnatural pace!

I see a strange thing. It looks like a mycelium. I saw similar fungus many times. After little grinding, substance made of them can enhance organisms. Well, it smells really spicy. Since I ate it I feel refreshed. I have a great desire to destroy something.

I see a strange thing. It looks like a mycelium. I saw similar fungus many times. After little grinding, substance made of them can enhance organisms. Well, it smells really spicy. I feel only a bit dizzy. That's it?! Stupid mycelium!
I spotted an unusual plant. It looks more like a mycelium from up close.
After touching it, it released a cloud of spores. Thankfuly my suit protected me from them.

event.Text: It looked suspicious so I threw a rock at it. After being hit mycelium released cloud of spores. They looked dangerous so with no other options I escaped.
I was curious so I touched it and a cloud of spores got right into my face. They stank as hell. I was choking and coughing but somehow managed to run away. Never again.
I was curious so I touched it and a cloud of spores got right into my face. I was choking and coughing and if that wasn't enough some of them got into my eyes! I escaped but I still barely can see.

event.text:
Huh? I think I saw something in the grass on that hill."
No chance. Must've been wind.
Yeah... It's probably nothing... I'd better go faster.
No chance. Must've been wind.
Yeah... It's probably nothing... I'd better go faster.
Oh, what's that smell? It seems to come from this fern. Strange, there is a bit of greenish fog around it.
It might be dangerous. I'd better step off.
I got a bit dizzy from this smell. I think I'm going to vommit.
Uh... I feel miserable... I can't stand on my feet. I'm gonna throw up.
My wounds start to itch more than ever probably 'cause of this fog. I'd better keep distance.
Ouch! My wounds burn! I feel how the fire spreads in my veins!
My god! What a pain! What happened?! I'm dying from the inside!
I need help... I don't think I can move anymore. My skin is tearing and blood is flowing from my wounds. If i die here at least bury my body.
I feel so disasterous that I would rather like to die... My wounds... My wounds are spreading all over my body. I feel it... My body is falling apart.
Wow... What an unusual sight! Those hills are completly covered by some yellow dust!
My sensors are running crazy! This substance appears to be some kind of spores glued to each other and analysis show that it is toxic. Fortunetely I'm protected.
Strange, my skin starts to itch. I guess it's because of this substance. I'd rather go around this place.
Ugh... This substance is sticky and it's all over me! It doesn't want to go off and starts to warm up. Shit! My skin is starting to boil inside!
Ugh... This substance is sticky and it's all over me! It doesn't want to go off and starts to warm up. Shit! My skin is starting to boil inside!
Ugh... It has covered me too! It's so sickening... My skin starts to burn! I have to take it off!
Oh,nice! There's nice Aetherite rock!
Hey, there are some fruits on this bush!
This grapes look good. I crushed one on the ground and the smell wasn't acrid. I'll take as many as I can. I don't know when I will find any other food.
They don't seem harmful. I'll take some for try.
This grapes look suspicious. I'd better don't touch them.
Huh? I think I heard a roar. Really fearsome one. Only a huge animal could be so loud. Probably I should go the opposite way.
Huh? I think I heard a roar. Really loud and what is worse close to me!
I have to stay close to the ground and whatever it is shouldn't be able to see me. Oh nice! There's a little bit of Aetherite. Just remember, no sudden moves.
Shit! It's closer than I wished. I have to escape... OK, I'm on the safe distance. Oh crap, my backpack was open! I hope that nothing valuable had been lost.
Shit! I'm not sure but I think that I saw it! That's enough! Run for your life!... Oh crap, my backpack was open! I hope that nothing valuable had been lost.
Shit! I saw it! That's enough! I have to run! Oh fuck! It's chasing me! It's faster! Aaahh! Help me! No!... Wait... what? Why did it leave me? Guess my suit didn't taste good. Lucky me...
Oh shit! There's a beast coming. I have to run until it isn't too late!... Oh crap, I lost something during my escape. Nevermind, I won't go back no matter what.

Shhh, I see a great creature. It looks like a predator and surely I don't want to be its prey. I have some food in my backpack. If I threw it, the best would have been distracted nad I would escape. It's a good plan. One, Two, Three, Go!... OK, I'm on a safe distance. Time to continue exploration.
Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... It was less dangerous than it seemed. At least it has some meat inside.
Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... The fight was tough, I've got some scratches, but in the end the stronger suvived. Splitterhounds are eatable, aren't they?

Oh shit! There is some huge animal coming! I'm prepared for fight!... Ahh... I underestimated it... At least I could scare it off but still I'm badly wounded, and this beast stole most of my food supplies. I have to be more cautious next time.
I see a strange cloud near to ground. Wait... It's a hive of some huge insects!
They are completly black. I will use some light to see more details. Incredible! They seem to die from artificial light! They are quite big so I suppose that they can be eaten.

They are closing the distance! They bodies are all black! Maybe if I use some light I will see some details? It made them mad! But at the same time they seem to die from artificial light. Probably they are eatable so I'll collect as many as I can.
Oh shit! They are coming towards me! I'd better don't mess with them!

They are closing the distance! Those stupid insects disgust me! I'll beat the crap out of you!... Well, that wasn't that hard. I just got bitten few times. They have some flesh, so probably it will be ok to eat them.
Oh shoot! They fly to me! Take it easy... don't panic and slowly go the opposite way. Ouch! One of them bit me! It's time to run!
Oh no! They are approaching! Shit! What should I do? Help!... I guess I have to run!
Oh nice hill I see over there. It will be a good spot to rest and do some recon.
I see our base from there! That's a sign that my mission goes towards its end!
I see our base from there! That's a sign that my mission goes towards its end!
I can't see any familiar place... This mission is going to end me. I already barely bear it. How long will it last?!
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
Oh I little brook over here! The sound of water is very relaxing.
Oh, there are some clamslike looking creatures underwater. I'll take some of them. Maybe they can be eaten?
Hey! I see some scrapped metal underwater! I wonder where did it come from. I think I should take it.
When I was breaching this small river, something bit my leg! It scared shit out of me!
I think I twisted my ankle while I was crossing this small river. I have problems with walking and the pain isn't the most pleasant thing in the world too.
Oh shit! I found pretty big Aetherite rock underwater! I have to pull it out!
Oh shit! There is a pile of metal over here! Where did it come from? Nevermind, I'll take as much as I can! It will surely be useful in base development!
Oh man, there's a cave going straight down. It's very dark there. If only I had a light source I could go down there and search for loot.
Yeah! I've go it!
OK, I've climbed down and... Oh... I don't know what to say... The cave is full of Aetherite! I'll take as much as I can.
The walls are too steep. I don't want to risk. It's not worth it.
Oh Fuck! I fell down! My chest is bursting in pain! I hope none of my ribs are broken... I feel disasterous... Now my only dream is to exit this damned cave.
But I don't have any, so it's pointless to risk especially if there are so steep walls.
Well, nothing interesting on my sight. What a peaceful time.
I hear grwoling and munching. A whole group of creatures.
They don't seem friendly. I'd better leave them before they notice my presence.
Oh shit! They saw me! I have to run!... Uh... Huh... I think I lost them. One of this little monsters scratched me but it's minor injury.
Those monstrosities were so disgusting. I was so afraid that I couldn't move. I'm not still sure how I managed to escape, but I did it. I think I'm gonna have nightmares.
I was ambushed by a group of small hideous creatures!
I killed most of them, and the rest fleed in panic but they left me some scratches. I hope they don't come back in greater number.
They got on me, but fortunetely they didn't like taste of my suit and left me alone. Regardless of that, it was traumatic experience.
Hey... There is something in the air. It's like a thin fog.
My sensor says it's acidic. I guess without protecion I would have burns all over my body.
I feel itching in my nostrils. I have to leave this place as soon as possible.
My nostrils are bleeding! I cannot smell! I must be that damned fog. I have to get outta here.
Ough! I have problems with breathing and I can't smell anything! I feel blood in my throat! It must've been that fog! I have to escape!
